column4: Has anyone ever had a problem develop where they can no longer install ubuntu?  My situation: I've been able to install numerous flavors of linux, always maintaining dual boot with Winxp.  However, I am attempting to install and tryout Jaunty which will startup and work in the live session, but when while running install hangs after step 3 - when it is scanning the partitions.  Any ideas
How long if reasonable?  10 mins?   and hour?
of course, it helps to pay attention to the HD LED and see if it's just a solid light, or if it flickers at all.
